name: Crystal Neck
description:
Postcard Edition : Special price reduced to encourage secondary/tertiary market and as souvenirs for all to keep. 

“Crystal Neck” portrays a posh lady in Victorian attire having a cup of a special drink. The drink is a magical potion that’ll help in bringing glad tidings in life. Those glad tidings comprise happiness, blessing, love, and success as what the potion forms in the transparent and shiny neck. The image symbolizes how the placebo effect work, we become what we consume and believe.
